ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.robot

Class Helper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.team4.robot.Helper

  • public abstract class Helper
extends Object
    This class provides helpful methods that can be used throughout the project. All the methods in this class are static. This is to avoid code duplication and consolidate methods that are used often by different classes.
    Author:
    Kevin Laframboise

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Helper() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double calculateDistanceError(double x, double y)
      This method calculates the euclidean distance error between the current location and the target point (x, y)
      static int convertAngle(double wheelRadius, double track, double angle)
      This method converts a change in heading to a rotation amount to be requested to the motors.
      static int convertDistance(double wheelRadius, double distance)
      This method converts a distance to a rotation amount to be requested to the motors.
      static int[][] convertToFourCorners(int upperRightX, int upperRightY, int lowerLeftX, int lowerLeftY)
      Converts a pair of "upper right-lower left" coordinates to a list of coordinates representing the four corners of a rectangular area.
      static int getFilteredDistance(SampleProvider us, float[] usData)
      Returns the median of a group of sample from a ultrasonic sensor.

    • Method Detail

      • convertAngle

        public static int convertAngle(double wheelRadius,
                               double track,
                               double angle)
        This method converts a change in heading to a rotation amount to be requested to the motors. This method was provided during lab 2 and is used as-is.
        Parameters:
        wheelRadius - radius of the robot's wheel.
        track - width of the robot.
        angle - change in heading required.
        Returns:
        wheel rotation amount, in degrees.

      • convertDistance

        public static int convertDistance(double wheelRadius,
                                  double distance)
        This method converts a distance to a rotation amount to be requested to the motors. This method was provided during lab 2 and is used as-is.
        Parameters:
        wheelRadius - radius of the robot's wheel.
        distance - to be traveled.
        Returns:
        rotation amount, in degrees.

      • getFilteredDistance

        public static int getFilteredDistance(SampleProvider us,
                                      float[] usData)
        Returns the median of a group of sample from a ultrasonic sensor.
        Parameters:
        us - SampleProvider of the US sensor to be polled.
        usData - buffer array for sensor data.
        Returns:
        distance from the object, in cm.

      • convertToFourCorners

        public static int[][] convertToFourCorners(int upperRightX,
                                           int upperRightY,
                                           int lowerLeftX,
                                           int lowerLeftY)
        Converts a pair of "upper right-lower left" coordinates to a list of coordinates representing the four corners of a rectangular area.
        Parameters:
        upperRightX -
        upperRightY -
        lowerLeftX -
        lowerLeftY -
        Returns:
        a bidimensional array containing the coordinates of the four corners of a rectangular area. The array is structured as follows: coords[i][j], i cycles corners from upper right, to lower right, to lower left, to upper left. j = 0 is the x coordinate, j = 1, the y.

        y -
        Returns:
